Initials: Initial M beneath miniature, with foliate ornament, on rectilinear ground
Objects: Bed, red bed cover, pillow, headsheet, sheets
Other: L'Amans sleeps within a barbed quatrefoil against a blue and gold patterned background, the miniature has a square gilt outer frame decorated with foliate tendrils; left and right have rectilinear bars with heart-shaped and ivy leaf extenders
